attributes.action: ensure that MP Derek Conway is investigated by the police for defrauding the tax payer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If a member of the public defrauded the Inland Revenue of £45000, then they would undoubtedly face criminal charges. 
The same should apply to MPs who defraud the tax payer. Derek Conway should be investigated by police and if found guilty, face criminal charges for fraud. Expulsion from the Conservative party is insufficient.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
